15.eng-name: The Chapters On Judgements From The Messenger of Allah
15.ara-name: كتاب الأحكام عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Rafi' bin Khadij:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade us from a matter that was of benefit for us. When one of us had some land and we would let someone use it for a portion of its produce or some Dirham. He said: 'When one of you has some land then let him grant it to his brother, or let him farm it
